body_html: @yuefengz Yes. Currently ParameterServerStrategy has been used in training models for recommendation system in one business unit of Alibaba Group. And I am also trying push MirroredStrategy to other users. Actually, I have encountered some performance optimization problems and also want to have a discussion with you about how to improve them in DistributionStrategy framework. I will send PRs or e-mails to you when needed. Thanks very much.

body: @yuefengz Yes. Currently `ParameterServerStrategy` has been used in training models for recommendation system in one business unit of Alibaba Group. And I am also trying push `MirroredStrategy` to other users.  Actually,  I have encountered some performance optimization problems and also want to have a discussion with you about how to improve them in `DistributionStrategy` framework. I will send PRs or e-mails to you when needed. Thanks very much.
